task: Parse an AWS S3 bucket name from an S3 URI (e.g., 's3://my-bucket/path/to/file.txt') and extract only the bucket name
Create a JSON CloudFormation template snippet that defines an AWS Lambda function with basic properties (function name, runtime, handler, and role ARN)
Write a Python function that takes an AWS IAM policy JSON string as input and returns True if it contains any wildcard ('*') resource permissions, False otherwise
